plays.text: Goal scored by Jason Woolley assisted by Luc Robitaille and Tomas Holmstrom
Penalty to Brendan Shanahan 2 minutes for Obstruction - Hooking(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Igor Larionov 2 minutes for High Sticking Branko Radivojevic
Goal scored by Igor Larionov assisted by Tomas Holmstrom and Mathieu Schneider
Penalty to Branko Radivojevic 2 minutes for Hooking Henrik Zetterberg
Goal scored by Ladislav Nagy assisted by Daymond Langkow and Todd Simpson
Penalty to Teppo Numminen 2 minutes for Tripping Henrik Zetterberg
Goal scored by Tomas Holmstrom assisted by Brendan Shanahan and Nicklas Lidstrom
Penalty to Kirk Maltby 2 minutes for Roughing Shane Doan
Penalty to Daymond Langkow 2 minutes for High Sticking Henrik Zetterberg
Penalty to Igor Larionov 2 minutes for Holding Scott Pellerin
Goal scored by Mike Johnson assisted by Ladislav Nagy
